content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --USCHFL
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000049
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --USCHFL is present.
Outcome:
  Message: --USCHFL is present.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0507
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              Cited Guidance: The following SDTM variables, defined for use in non-clinical
                studies (SEND), must NEVER be used in the submission of SDTM-based
                data for human clinical trials, --USCHFL (Interventions, Events, Findings),
                --DTHREL (Findings), --EXCLFL (Findings), --REASEX (Findings), --IMPLBL
                (Findings), FETUSID (Identifiers), --DETECT (Timing Variables), --NOMDY
                (Timing Variables), --NOMLBL (Timing Variables)
              Document: IG v3.4
              Item: SDTM Variables Not Allowed in SDTMIG
              Section: '2.7'
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0622
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              Cited Guidance: Not in human clinical trials.
              Document: Model v2.0
              Section: Interventions|Events|Findings
              Item: --USCHFL
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --USCHFL is present.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The following SDTM variables, defined for use in non-clinical studies (SEND), must NEVER be used in the submission of SDTM-based data for human clinical trials, --USCHFL (Interventions, Events, Findings), --DTHREL (Findings), --EXCLFL (Findings), --REASEX (Findings), --IMPLBL (Findings), FETUSID (Identifiers), --DETECT (Timing Variables), --NOMDY (Timing Variables), --NOMLBL (Timing Variables)
Citations.Item: SDTM Variables Not Allowed in SDTMIG
